string.name: name
string.value: Making the Secret Medicine for Transformation
I want to enter the Cave of Life one more time...I wonder if I could get the transformation medicine again. Let's go see Moira again.

Moira told me to bring her all the ingredients if I want the transformation medicine again. Let's get back to Moira with all the ingredients.

#i4001103##t4001103# #b#c4001103##k / 1
#i4000267##t4000267# #b#c4000267##k / 1
#i4001104##t4001104# #b#c4001104##k / 1
#i4001105##t4001105# #b#c4001105##k / 10
#i4001078##t4001078# #b#c4001078##k / 1
I gave Moira all the ingredients again and she made me a tarnsformation medicine that allows me to transform into Cornian.
변신의 비약이 필요해서 오셨군요. 아직 혼테일을 물리치시지는 못했나보죠? 당신이 원한다면 다시 한번 비약을 만들어 드리죠. 드래곤 변신 비약을 만드시겠어요?
You came here to get a secret medicine. Haven't you beat off Horntail. I can make a secret medicine for you again if you want. Do you want it?
You can get Cornian's Marrow and skull shoulder guard from #rCornians#k, Manon's crying sound from #rManon#k in Minar Forest. You also can get tough dragon leather from #rDrakes#k in Victoria Island.
Most important thing, Cornian's short sword can be earned by the best blacksmith #bMos#k in Leafre town. Hurry up! I'll be waiting for you.
Without secret medicine, it's impossible to get into the Cave of Life.
Did you gather everything? Let me see...Great!!! Wait a minute.
When you take this medicine, you look like Cornian for a while. Keep in mind that the medicine stops working if you're out of the town. Don't forget that.
Good luck to you. Please beat Horntail off.

Do you remember what I said?In order to make a secret medicine to transform into dragon, I need 

#i4001075# 1 #k#t4001075# #b
#i4000267# 1 #k#t4000267# #b
#i4001076# 1#k#t4001076# #b
#i4001077# 10#k#t4001077# #b
#i4001078# 1#k#t4001078# #b#k.
